scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an interior space. On the left, an angel, identified by wings and a halo, kneels and gestures towards the Virgin Mary on the right. The angel wears a red robe over blue leggings and pointed shoes. The Virgin Mary, also with a halo, kneels with her hands clasped, holding a red book. She is dressed in a blue robe. The background features a pink wall with decorative elements and a large arched window revealing a landscape with hills, trees, and a body of water. The floor is tiled in a black and white checkerboard pattern. The architectural setting includes two large arches framing the scene and a smaller arched niche above the window.
